<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Civil Rights of Japanese-American Internees</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zivilrechte der Japanisch-Amerikanischen 
Internees</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Droits civiques des internés 
Japonais-Américains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direitas civis de internees Japonês-Americanos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diritti civili dei internees Giapponese-Americani</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστικά δικαιώματα ιαπωνικός-αμερικανικού Internees</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las derechas civiles de internados 
Japone's-Americanos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson students analyze basic civic and human rights and determine if Japanese Americans rights were violated during WWII. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion analysieren Kursteilnehmer 
grundlegende bürgerliche und menschliche Rechte und stellen fest, 
wenn japanische Amerikanerrechte während WWII verletzt wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon les étudiants analysent des 
droits de l'homme civiques et de base et déterminent si des droits 
japonais d'Américains étaient violés pendant le WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição os estudantes analisam direitas 
civic e humanas básicas e determinam se as direitas japonesas dos 
americanos violated durante WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione allievi analizzano i diritti 
dell'uomo civici e di base e determinano se i diritti giapponesi degli
Americani fossero violati durante il WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα οι σπουδαστές αναλύουν τα βασικά 
πολιτικά και ανθρώπινα δικαιώματα και καθορίζουν εάν τα ιαπωνικά
δικαιώματα Αμερικανών παραβιάστηκαν κατά τη διάρκεια WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección los estudiantes analizan derechos
cívicos y humanos básicos y se determinan si las derechas japonesas 
de los americanos fueron violadas durante WWII.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>

    </item>
